title: Cheap TV deal: get this 75-inch 4K TV is on sale for $699.99 at Best Buy
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score epic TV deals at the Best Buy 3-day sale
article: The Best Buy 3-day sale kicks off today, and we've spotted an incredible deal on a 75-inch 4K TV. For a limited time, you can get this Hisense 75-inch 4K smart TV on sale for $699.99 (was $999.99). That's a massive $300 discount and an incredible price for a feature-rich big-screen 4K TV.

While this Hisense set might not be the best TV in the world, it does feature 4K HD resolution and DTS Virtual X technology for a cinema-like picture experience with bold, bright colors and an immersive audio experience. The big-screen TV also has smart capabilities, so you can enjoy your favorite movies and TV shows from apps like Netflix, Hulu, Disney Plus, and more. You're also getting a handy voice remote and the Google Assistant built in so you can control your TV and compatible smart home devices completely hands-free.
